00033 RainbruRPG::Gui::PlayerList::PlayerList(int x, int y, int w, int h)
00034                     :Fl_Group(x, y, w, h, "Player list") {
00035 
00036     this->box(FL_SHADOW_BOX);
00037   
00038     hbList=new Fl_Hold_Browser(x+10, y+10, 200, h-20 );
00039     
00040     floBlacklist=new Fl_Output(x+320, y+10, 150, 20, "BlackList");
00041     floCreationDate=new Fl_Output( x+320, y+30, 250, 20, "Creation date");
00042     floPwdHash=new Fl_Multiline_Output (x+320, y+50, 320, 20, "Password");
00043     floMail=new Fl_Output( x+320, y+70, 250, 20, "Mail adress");
00044     floMailConfirmation=new Fl_Output( x+400, y+90, 250, 20, 
00045                                         "Mail confirmation's date");
00046 
00047     confirmBtn= new Fl_Button(x+320, y+110, 300, 30, 
00048                               "Mail adress confirmation is done" );
00049 
00050     Fl_Button *addBtn= new Fl_Button(x+w-110, y+10, 100, 30, "Add" );
00051     delBtn= new Fl_Button(x+w-110, y+10+35, 100, 30, "Delete" );
00052     pwdBtn= new Fl_Button(x+w-110, y+10+70, 100, 30, "New pwd" );
00053     blkBtn= new Fl_Button(x+w-110, y+10+105, 100, 30, "Blacklist" );
00054     notBtn= new Fl_Button(x+w-110, y+10+165, 100, 30, "Notepad" );
00055 
00056   this->end();
00057   
00058   delBtn->deactivate();
00059   pwdBtn->deactivate();
00060   blkBtn->deactivate();
00061   notBtn->deactivate();
00062   confirmBtn->deactivate();
00063 
00064   addBtn->callback(cbAddPlayer, this);
00065   delBtn->callback(cbDelPlayer, this);
00066   hbList->callback(cbShowPlayer, this);
00067   blkBtn->callback(cbBlacklist, this);
00068   notBtn->callback(cbNotepad, this);
00069   confirmBtn->callback(cbConfirm, this);
00070 
00071   loadPlayerList();
00072 }

00077 RainbruRPG::Gui::PlayerList::~PlayerList(){
00078   hbList=NULL;
00079 
00080   floBlacklist=NULL;
00081   floPwdHash=NULL;
00082   floCreationDate=NULL;
00083   floMail=NULL;
00084   floMailConfirmation=NULL;
00085 
00086   delBtn=NULL;
00087   pwdBtn=NULL;
00088   blkBtn=NULL;
00089   notBtn=NULL;
00090   ap=NULL;
00091   pl=NULL;
00092 
00093   if (ap!=NULL){
00094     delete ap;
00095     ap=NULL;
00096   }
00097   if (pl!=NULL){
00098     delete pl;
00099     pl=NULL;
00100   }
00101 }

00111   ( (PlayerList*)f )->i_cbAddPlayer();

00120 void RainbruRPG::Gui::PlayerList::i_cbAddPlayer(){
00121   if (ap==NULL){
00122     ap=new AddPlayer( this );
00123   }
00124   else{
00125     ap->show();
00126     ap->roll();
00127   }
00128 }

00135 void RainbruRPG::Gui::PlayerList::loadPlayerList(){
00136   tPlayerList::const_iterator iter;
00137  
00138   pl= new tPlayerList();
00139 
00140   xmlPlayerList xmlPl;
00141   pl=xmlPl.getPlayerList();
00142   
00143   if (pl){
00144     for (iter=pl->begin(); iter != pl->end(); iter++){
00145       hbList->add( (*iter)->name );
00146     }
00147   }
00148 }

00157 void RainbruRPG::Gui::PlayerList::cbShowPlayer(Fl_Widget *w, void *f){
00158   ( (PlayerList*)f )->i_cbShowPlayer();

00160 
00164 void RainbruRPG::Gui::PlayerList::i_cbShowPlayer(){
00165   tPlayerList::const_iterator iter;
00166 
00167   showNonePlayer();
00168 
00169   // get the selected item
00170   int sel=hbList->value();
00171 
00172 
00173   // An item is selected
00174   if (sel>0){
00175     //get the text of this item
00176     const char* str= hbList->text(sel);
00177     
00178 
00179     // Iterate through the tPlayerList
00180     if (pl){
00181       for (iter=pl->begin(); iter != pl->end(); iter++){
00182         const char* tname=(*iter)->name;
00183         // If the two names are the same
00184         if(strcmp(str, tname)==0){
00185           showPlayer((*iter));
00186         }
00187       }
00188     }
00189   }
00190   else // None player is selected
00191     showNonePlayer();
00192 
00193 }
00194 
00202 void RainbruRPG::Gui::PlayerList::showPlayer(tPlayerListItem* i){
00203 
00204   if (i->blacklist)
00205     floBlacklist->value("yes");
00206   else
00207     floBlacklist->value("no");
00208 
00209   floPwdHash->value(i->password);
00210   floCreationDate->value(i->creation.c_str());
00211   floMail->value(i->mail);
00212   floMailConfirmation->value(i->confirm.c_str());
00213   // The confirmation button
00214 
00215   xmlPlayerList xmlPl;
00216   if(!xmlPl.isMailConfirmed( i->name ))
00217     confirmBtn->activate();
00218 
00219   // The other buttons
00220   delBtn->activate();
00221   pwdBtn->activate();
00222   blkBtn->activate();
00223   notBtn->activate();
00224 }
00225 
00231 void RainbruRPG::Gui::PlayerList::showNonePlayer(){
00232   floBlacklist->value("");
00233   floPwdHash->value("");
00234   floCreationDate->value("");
00235   floMail->value("");
00236   floMailConfirmation->value("");
00237 
00238   delBtn->deactivate();
00239   pwdBtn->deactivate();
00240   blkBtn->deactivate();
00241   notBtn->deactivate();
00242   confirmBtn->deactivate();
00243 
00244 }

00254   ( (PlayerList*)f )->i_cbDelPlayer();

00256 
00260 void RainbruRPG::Gui::PlayerList::i_cbDelPlayer(){
00261   int sel=hbList->value();
00262 
00263   if (sel>0){
00264     //get the text of this item
00265     const char* plName= hbList->text(sel);
00266 
00267     // Delete the player through curl
00268     CurlPlayerDelete tpa;
00269     tpa.setPostedData("name", plName);
00270     
00271     bool success=tpa.perform();
00272     
00273     if (!success)
00274       ShowCurlError::showError(&tpa);
00275     
00276     this->refresh();
00277 
00278   }
00279 }
00280 
00284 void RainbruRPG::Gui::PlayerList::refresh(){
00285   LOGI("Refresh Playerlist");
00286   showNonePlayer();
00287   hbList->clear();
00288   loadPlayerList();
00289 
00290 }

00313 void RainbruRPG::Gui::PlayerList::refreshKeep(){
00314  // store the selected item id
00315   int sel=hbList->value();
00316 
00317   refresh();
00318 
00319   // restore the stored and shown tiem
00320   hbList->select(sel);
00321   i_cbShowPlayer();
00322 }

00338 void RainbruRPG::Gui::PlayerList::i_cbNotepad(){
00339   LOGI("Player notepad shown");
00340  // get the selected item
00341   int sel=hbList->value();
00342 
00343   // An item is selected
00344   if (sel>0){
00345     //get the text of this item
00346     const char* plName= hbList->text(sel);
00347 
00348     PlayerNotePad* plnp=new PlayerNotePad( plName );
00349   }
00350 }
